game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact from the temple.
game.description: A mysterious legend says that the artifact is hidden deep within an old temple in the heart of the jungle. You must navigate treacherous traps and solve puzzles to reach it.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the temple
task.description: You've heard rumors that the entrance is marked by a pair of ancient statues.

task.objective: Disarm the trap at the temple's entrance
task.description: A pressure plate triggers a poison dart trap. Find a way to safely cross.
